name: Biggest Chonker
description:
You're a cat. You love attention, you crave attention. You've noticed that fat cats are quite popular on the internet, so you've decided to put on some weight.

Each day fill your schedule with up to 4 activities (planned more, no time :( ).

Each activity is a little minigame. Your chonk gain per minigame is your food gain - energy used. If you gain enough chonk, you level up and gain weight.

The minigames get harder as you level up. Try to reach level 8 and win the game.

I will release a post-jam version at some point with fixes and more activities.

I know that the music jumps and it's annoying, sorry.

Some of the sound effects were shamelessly stolen from Scratch lol. They're under the Creative commons Attribution-ShareAlike license.
